11 {
12 void ParticleFilter::fuseRobots()
13 {
14  state.robotsFused = true;
15 
16  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
17  {
18  std::vector<float> probabilities(nRobots_, 1.0);
19  std::vector<uint> landmarksUsed(nRobots_, 0);
20 
21  for (uint l = 0; l < nLandmarks_; ++l)
22  {
23  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
24  {
25  if (false == robotsUsed_[r] || false == bufMeasurements_[r][l].found)
26  continue;
27 
28  uint o_robot = r * nStatesPerRobot_;
29 
30  Measurement& m = bufMeasurements_[r][l];
31 
32  // Observation in robot frame
33  Eigen::Vector2f Zrobot(m.x, m.y);
34 
35  // Transformation to global frame
36  Eigen::Rotation2Df Rrobot(particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][p]);
37  Eigen::Vector2f Srobot(particles_[o_robot + O_X][p],
38  particles_[o_robot + O_Y][p]);
39  Eigen::Vector2f Zglobal = Srobot + Rrobot * Zrobot;
40 
41  // Error in observation
42  Eigen::Vector2f LM(landmarksMap_[l].x, landmarksMap_[l].y);
43  Eigen::Vector2f Zglobal_err = LM - Zglobal;
44  Eigen::Vector2f Z_Zcap = Zrobot - Zglobal_err;
45 
46  ROS_DEBUG_COND(p == 0, "Error in seeing landmark %d = (%f , %f)", l,
47  Zglobal_err[O_X], Zglobal_err[O_Y]);
48  ROS_DEBUG_COND(p == 0,
49  "Landmark %d is at (%f , %f) and I see it at (%f, %f)",
50  l, LM[O_X], LM[O_Y], Zglobal[O_X], Zglobal[O_Y]);
51 
52  // The values of interest to the particle weights
53  // Note: using Eigen wasn't of particular interest here since it does
54  // not
55  float expArg = -0.5 * (Z_Zcap[0] * Z_Zcap[0] / m.covXX +
56  Z_Zcap[1] * Z_Zcap[1] / m.covYY);
57  float detValue = 1.0; // powf( (2*PI*Q[0][0]*Q[1][1]),-0.5);
58 
59  probabilities[r] *= detValue * exp(expArg);
60  landmarksUsed[r]++;
61  }
62  }
63 
64  // Update mean error vector
65  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
66  {
67  if (false == robotsUsed_[r])
68  continue;
69 
70  if (landmarksUsed[r] > 0)
71  weightComponents_[r][p] = probabilities[r];
72  }
73  }
74 
75  // Reset weights of the particle filter
76  resetWeights();
77 
78  // Duplicate particles
79  particles_t dupParticles(particles_);
80 
81  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
82  {
83  if (false == robotsUsed_[r])
84  continue;
85 
86  uint o_robot = r * nStatesPerRobot_;
87 
88  // Create a vector of indexes according to a descending order of the weights
89  // components of robot r
90  std::vector<uint> sorted = order_index<pdata_t>(weightComponents_[r], DESC);
91 
92  // For every particle
93  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
94  {
95  // Re-order the particle subsets of this robot
96  int sort_index = sorted[p];
97  particles_[o_robot + O_X][p] = dupParticles[o_robot + O_X][sort_index];
98  particles_[o_robot + O_Y][p] = dupParticles[o_robot + O_Y][sort_index];
99  particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][p] =
100  dupParticles[o_robot + O_THETA][sort_index];
101 
102  // Update the particle weight (will get multiplied nRobots times and get a
103  // lower value)
104  particles_[WEIGHT_INDEX][p] *= weightComponents_[r][sort_index];
105  }
106  }
107 
108  // Debugging
109  // for(uint p=0; p<nParticles_/5; ++p)
110  // ROS_DEBUG("pWeight[%d] = %f", p, particles_[WEIGHT_INDEX][p]);
111 
112  state.robotsFused = true;
113 }
114 
115 void ParticleFilter::assign(const pdata_t value)
116 {
117  for (int i = 0; i < nSubParticleSets_; ++i)
118  assign(value, i);
119 }
120 
121 void ParticleFilter::assign(const pdata_t value, const uint index)
122 {
123  particles_[index].assign(nParticles_, value);
124 }
125 
126 ParticleFilter::ParticleFilter(const uint nParticles, const uint nTargets,
127  const uint statesPerRobot, const uint nRobots,
128  const uint nLandmarks,
129  const std::vector<bool>& robotsUsed,
130  const std::vector<Landmark>& landmarksMap,
131  const std::vector<float> alpha)
132  : nParticles_(nParticles), nTargets_(nTargets),
133  nStatesPerRobot_(statesPerRobot), nRobots_(nRobots),
134  nSubParticleSets_(nTargets * STATES_PER_TARGET +
135  nRobots * statesPerRobot + 1),
136  nLandmarks_(nLandmarks),
137  particles_(nSubParticleSets_, subparticles_t(nParticles)), seed_(time(0)),
138  initialized_(false), state(nRobots), alpha_(alpha),
139  bufMeasurements_(nRobots, std::vector<Measurement>(nLandmarks)),
140  iterationTimeS(TIME_NOTAVAILABLE), robotsUsed_(robotsUsed),
141  landmarksMap_(landmarksMap),
142  weightComponents_(nRobots, subparticles_t(nParticles, 0.0))
143 {
144 
145  // If vector alpha is not provided, use a default one
146  if (alpha_.empty())
147  {
148  for (int r = 0; r < nRobots; ++r)
149  {
150  alpha_.push_back(0.015);
151  alpha_.push_back(0.1);
152  alpha_.push_back(0.5);
153  alpha_.push_back(0.001);
154  }
155  }
156 
157  // Check size of vector alpha
158  if (alpha_.size() != 4 * nRobots)
159  {
160  ROS_ERROR("The provided vector alpha is not of the correct size. Returning "
161  "without particle filter! (should have %d=nRobots*4 elements)",
162  nRobots * 4);
163  return;
164  }
165 
166  ROS_INFO("Created particle filter with dimensions %d, %d",
167  (int)particles_.size(), (int)particles_[0].size());
168 }
169 
170 ParticleFilter::ParticleFilter(const ParticleFilter& other)
171  : nParticles_(other.nParticles_), nTargets_(other.nTargets_),
172  nLandmarks_(other.nLandmarks_),
173  nSubParticleSets_(other.nSubParticleSets_),
174  nStatesPerRobot_(other.nStatesPerRobot_), nRobots_(other.nRobots_),
175  particles_(other.nSubParticleSets_, subparticles_t(other.nParticles_)),
176  seed_(time(0)), initialized_(other.initialized_),
177  bufMeasurements_(other.nRobots_,
178  std::vector<Measurement>(other.nLandmarks_)),
179  targetMotionState(other.targetMotionState), state(other.state),
180  robotsUsed_(other.robotsUsed_), landmarksMap_(other.landmarksMap_),
181  weightComponents_(other.weightComponents_)
182 {
183  ROS_DEBUG("Creating copy of another pf");
184 
185  // Only thing left is to copy particle values
186  particles_ = other.particles_; // std::vector assignment operator! yay C++
187 }

189 // TODO set different values for position and orientation, targets, etc
190 // Simple version, use default values - randomize all values between [-10,10]
191 void ParticleFilter::init()
192 {
193  if (initialized_)
194  return;
195 
196  int lvalue = -10;
197  int rvalue = 10;
198 
199  std::vector<double> def((nSubParticleSets_ - 1) * 2);
200 
201  for (int i = 0; i < def.size(); i += 2)
202  {
203  def[i] = lvalue;
204  def[i + 1] = rvalue;
205  }
206 
207  // Call the custom function with these values
208  init(def);
209 }
210 
211 // Overloaded function when using custom values
212 void ParticleFilter::init(const std::vector<double> custom)
213 {
214  if (initialized_)
215  return;
216 
217  ROS_INFO("Initializing particle filter");
218 
219  ROS_DEBUG_COND(custom.size() != ((nSubParticleSets_ - 1) * 2),
220  "The provided vector for initilization does not have the "
221  "correct size (should have %d elements",
222  (nSubParticleSets_ - 1) * 2);
223 
224  // For all subparticle sets except the particle weights
225  for (int i = 0; i < custom.size() / 2; ++i)
226  {
227  ROS_DEBUG("Values for distribution: %.4f %.4f", custom[2 * i],
228  custom[2 * i + 1]);
229 
230  boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> dist(custom[2 * i],
231  custom[2 * i + 1]);
232 
233  // Sample a value from the uniform distribution for each particle
234  BOOST_FOREACH (pdata_t& val, particles_[i])
235  {
236  val = dist(seed_);
237  }
238  }
239 
240  // Particle weights init with same weight (1/nParticles)
241  resetWeights();
242 
243  // Set flag
244  initialized_ = true;
245 
246  ROS_INFO("Particle filter initialized");
247 }
248 
249 void ParticleFilter::predict(const uint robotNumber, const Odometry odom)
250 {
251  if (!initialized_)
252  return;
253 
254  using namespace boost::random;
255 
256  ROS_DEBUG("Predicting for Robot %d", robotNumber + 1);
257 
258  // Variables concerning this robot specifically
259  int robot_offset = robotNumber * nStatesPerRobot_;
260  float alpha[4] = { alpha_[robotNumber * 4], alpha_[robotNumber * 4 + 1],
261  alpha_[robotNumber * 4 + 2], alpha_[robotNumber * 4 + 3] };
262 
263  // TODO find out if this model is correct
264  // Determining the propagation of the robot state through odometry
265  float deltaRot = atan2(odom.y, odom.x) - odom.theta;
266  float deltaTrans = sqrt(odom.x * odom.x + odom.y * odom.y);
267  float deltaFinalRot = odom.theta - deltaRot;
268 
269  // Create an error model based on a gaussian distribution
270  normal_distribution<> deltaRotEffective(deltaRot, alpha[0] * fabs(deltaRot) +
271  alpha[1] * deltaTrans);
272  normal_distribution<> deltaTransEffective(
273  deltaTrans,
274  alpha[2] * deltaTrans + alpha[3] * fabs(deltaRot + deltaFinalRot));
275  normal_distribution<> deltaFinalRotEffective(
276  deltaFinalRot, alpha[0] * fabs(deltaFinalRot) + alpha[1] * deltaTrans);
277 
278  // Debugging
279  ROS_DEBUG("Before prediction: p[%d] = [%f %f %f]", nParticles_ / 2,
280  particles_[O_X + robot_offset][nParticles_ / 2],
281  particles_[O_Y + robot_offset][nParticles_ / 2],
282  particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][nParticles_ / 2]);
283  ROS_DEBUG("Odometry = [%f %f %f]", odom.x, odom.y, odom.theta);
284 
285  for (int i = 0; i < nParticles_; i++)
286  {
287  // Rotate to final position
288  particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i] += deltaRotEffective(seed_);
289 
290  // Translate to final position
291  particles_[O_X + robot_offset][i] +=
292  deltaTransEffective(seed_) * cos(particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i]);
293  particles_[O_Y + robot_offset][i] +=
294  deltaTransEffective(seed_) * sin(particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i]);
295 
296  // Rotate to final position and normalize angle
297  particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i] = angles::normalize_angle(
298  particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i] + deltaFinalRotEffective(seed_));
299  }
300 
301  // Debugging
302  ROS_DEBUG("After prediction: p[%d] = [%f %f %f]", nParticles_ / 2,
303  particles_[O_X + robot_offset][nParticles_ / 2],
304  particles_[O_Y + robot_offset][nParticles_ / 2],
305  particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][nParticles_ / 2]);
306 
307  // Change predicted state
308  state.predicted[robotNumber] = true;
309 
310  // If all robots have predicted, also predict the target state
311  if (targetMotionState.started && state.allPredicted())
312  {
313  ROS_DEBUG("Robot%d is predicting the target state.", robotNumber);
314 
315  // Random acceleration model
316  normal_distribution<> targetAcceleration(TARGET_RAND_MEAN,
317  TARGET_RAND_STDDEV);
318 
319  for (int i = 0; i < nParticles_; i++)
320  {
321  // delta = v*dt + 0.5*a*dt^2 with a new random acceleration for each
322  // component
323  particles_[O_TARGET + O_TX][i] += targetMotionState.Vx * iterationTimeS *
324  0.5 * targetAcceleration(seed_) *
325  pow(iterationTimeS, 2);
326  particles_[O_TARGET + O_TY][i] += targetMotionState.Vy * iterationTimeS *
327  0.5 * targetAcceleration(seed_) *
328  pow(iterationTimeS, 2);
329  particles_[O_TARGET + O_TZ][i] += targetMotionState.Vz * iterationTimeS *
330  0.5 * targetAcceleration(seed_) *
331  pow(iterationTimeS, 2);
332  }
333  }
334 
335  // Start fusing if all robots have done their measurements and predictions
336  if (!state.robotsFused && state.allMeasurementsDone() && state.allPredicted())
337  fuseRobots();
338 }
339 
340 void ParticleFilter::allMeasurementsDone(const uint robotNumber)
341 {
342  // Change state of measurementsDone
343  state.measurementsDone[robotNumber] = true;
344 
345  // Start fusing if all robots have done their measurements and predictions
346  if (!state.robotsFused && state.allMeasurementsDone() && state.allPredicted())
347  fuseRobots();
348 }
